blocks.name: cghm
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the generator of group hom-sets.
blocks.origin: const class cghm { GrpHom }

blocks.name: diff.cghm.s
diff.cghm.c
diff.cghm.w
df-ghm
blocks.content: A homomorphism of groups is a map between two structures which preserves the group operation. Requiring both sides to be groups simplifies most theorems at the cost of complicating the theorem which pushes forward a group structure. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ghm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cghm, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, cgrp, cab(s2, wsbc(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wf(cv(s2), cv(s3), cfv(cbs, cv(s1))), wral(s4, cv(s3), wral(s5, cv(s3), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s4), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s5))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-ghm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ GrpHom =(s0 ∈ Grp, s1 ∈ Grp ↦ { s2 |[(Base ` s0)/ s3]((s2 : s3 →(Base ` s1))∧ ∀(s4 ∈ s3, ∀(s5 ∈ s3,(s2 `(s4[(+ ` s0)]s5))=((s2 ` s4)[(+ ` s1)](s2 ` s5)))))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: reldmghm
blocks.content: Lemma for group homomorphisms. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldmghm() {
  |- wrel(cdm(cghm))
} = {
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cghm, cgrp, cgrp, cab(hs3, wsbc(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, cv(hs1))), wral(hs4, cv(hs2), wral(hs5, cv(hs2), wceq(cfv(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs4), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), cv(hs5))), co(cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs4)), cfv(cplusg, cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs5))))))))))
  df-ghm(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs2, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reldmghm() {
  ⊢ Rel(dom(GrpHom))
} = {
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cghm, cgrp, cgrp, { hs3 |[(Base ` hs0)/ hs2]((hs3 : hs2 →(Base ` hs1))∧ ∀(hs4 ∈ hs2, ∀(hs5 ∈ hs2,(hs3 `(hs4[(+ ` hs0)]hs5))=((hs3 ` hs4)[(+ ` hs1)](hs3 ` hs5)))))})
  df-ghm(hs0, hs1, hs3, hs2, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
}

thm isghm3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1)), wa(wf(c2, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  baib(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cghm, c1)), wa(wf(c2, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c2, cv(s1))))))))
  isghm(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6)
}

thm ghmsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5))))

} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5)), cfv(c0, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5))), co(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), cfv(c0, c5))), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5))), co(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), cfv(c0, c5))), co(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5))), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5))), co(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5), c4))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5), c4), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c5, c4))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4))
  grpinvcl(c1, c5, c4, cfv(cminusg, c1))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5)), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), cfv(c0, c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5)), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), cfv(c0, c5))))
  ghminv(c0, c1, c2, c5, c4, cfv(cminusg, c1), cfv(cminusg, c2))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wceq(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), cfv(c0, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5)))))
  fveq2d(c0, co(c3, c6, c5), co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c1), c5)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)))
  grpsubval(c3, c4, c5, c6, cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cminusg, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c1))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c2), cfv(c0, c5)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  3impb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(cbs, c2))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(cbs, c2))), wf(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  anim12dan(wf(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c4), wcel(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c5), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ffvelrn(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2), c3)
  ffvelrn(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2), c5)

thm ghmsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4)→(c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(-g ` c1)
  ⊣ c7 =(-g ` c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c0 `(c3[c6]c5)), ((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)), (c0 `(c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5))), ((c0 ` c3)[(+ ` c2)]((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5))), (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4))
  eqtrd((c0 `(c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5))), ((c0 ` c3)[(+ ` c2)]((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5))), ((c0 ` c3)[(+ ` c2)](c0 `((invg ` c1)` c5))), (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4))
  syld3an3(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, (c0 `(c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5)))=((c0 ` c3)[(+ ` c2)](c0 `((invg ` c1)` c5))), ((invg ` c1)` c5)∈ c4)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4), ((invg ` c1)` c5)∈ c4, c1 ∈ Grp, c5 ∈ c4)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ Grp)
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4)
  grpinvcl(c1, c5, c4, (invg ` c1))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, ((invg ` c1)` c5), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2))
  oveq2d((c0 ` c3), (+ ` c2), (c0 `((invg ` c1)` c5)), ((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5)), (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4))
  3adant2(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, (c0 `((invg ` c1)` c5))=((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5)))
  ghminv(c0, c1, c2, c5, c4, (invg ` c1), (invg ` c2))
  3adant1(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, (c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=(c0 `(c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5))))
  fveq2d(c0, (c3[c6]c5), (c3[(+ ` c1)]((invg ` c1)` c5)), (c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4))
  grpsubval(c3, c4, c5, c6, (+ ` c1), (invg ` c1), c1)
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((invg ` c1))
  syl((c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4), ((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5))=((c0 ` c3)[(+ ` c2)]((invg ` c2)`(c0 ` c5))), ((c0 ` c3)∈(Base ` c2)∧(c0 ` c5)∈(Base ` c2)))
  3impb(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, ((c0 ` c3)∈(Base ` c2)∧(c0 ` c5)∈(Base ` c2)))
  sylan(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4), ((c0 ` c3)∈(Base ` c2)∧(c0 ` c5)∈(Base ` c2)), (c0 : c4 →(Base ` c2)))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, c4, (Base ` c2))
  anim12dan((c0 : c4 →(Base ` c2)), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, (c0 ` c3)∈(Base ` c2), (c0 ` c5)∈(Base ` c2))
  ffvelrn(c0, c4, (Base ` c2), c3)
  ffvelrn(c0, c4, (Base ` c2), c5)
  grpsubval((c0 ` c3), (Base ` c2), (c0 ` c5), c7, (+ ` c2), (invg ` c2), c2)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  eqid((invg ` c2))
}

blocks.name: isghmd
blocks.content: Deduction for a group homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isghmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl21anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp), wa(wf(c0, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))))))
  jca(w0, wf(c0, c3, c4), wral(s0, c3, wral(s1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c3, c3, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c6, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  isghm(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
}

blocks.name: ghmmhm
blocks.content: A group homomorphism is a monoid homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ghmmhm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)))
} = {
  syl21anbrc(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd), w3a(wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2))))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c2, cmnd), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  ghmgrp2(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c2)
  3jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2)))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2))
  ghmid(c0, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2))
  ismhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm ghmmhm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)→ c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2))
} = {
  syl21anbrc(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), c1 ∈ Mnd, c2 ∈ Mnd, ((c0 :(Base ` c1)→(Base ` c2))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c1),(c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1))))∧(c0 `(0 ` c1))=(0 ` c2)))
  syl(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c1 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈ Grp)
  ghmgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c1)
  syl(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), c2 ∈ Mnd, c2 ∈ Grp)
  ghmgrp2(c0, c1, c2)
  grpmnd(c2)
  3jca(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 :(Base ` c1)→(Base ` c2)), ∀(hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), ∀(hs1 ∈(Base ` c1),(c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1)))), (c0 `(0 ` c1))=(0 ` c2))
  ghmf(c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c1), c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1)))
  3expb(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), hs0 ∈(Base ` c1), hs1 ∈(Base ` c1), (c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1)))
  ghmlin(c0, c1, c2, hs0, (Base ` c1), hs1, (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2))
  ghmid(c0, c1, c2, (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2))
  ismhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c2), (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: ghmmhmb
blocks.content: Group homomorphisms and monoid homomorphisms coincide. (Thus, ` GrpHom ` is somewhat redundant, although its stronger reverse closure properties are sometimes useful.) (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ghmmhmb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wceq(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c0, cmhm, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
  ghmmhm(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)))
  isghmd(hs1, hs2, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  mhmf(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  adantll(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0))), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  3expb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs2), cfv(cbs, c0)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  mhmlin(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs2), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cghm, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmhm, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, c1))

  feq2d((c0 |` c3), c3, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c4), (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)))
  syldan((c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)), (hs0 ∈(Base ` c4)∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c4)), ((c0 |` c3)`(hs0[(+ ` c4)]hs1))=(((c0 |` c3)` hs0)[(+ ` c2)]((c0 |` c3)` hs1)), (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3))

  eleq2(c3, (Base ` c4), hs0)

  3eqtr4d(((c0 |` c3)`(hs0[(+ ` c4)]hs1)), (((c0 |` c3)` hs0)[(+ ` c2)]((c0 |` c3)` hs1)), (c0 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)), ((c0 ` hs0)[(+ ` c2)](c0 ` hs1)), ((c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈(SubGrp ` c1))∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3)))

blocks.name: ghmnsgima
blocks.content: The image of a normal subgroup under a surjective homomorphism is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ghmker
blocks.content: The kernel of a homomorphism is a normal subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ghmeqker
blocks.content: Two source points map to the same destination point under a group homomorphism iff their difference belongs to the kernel. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)

blocks.name: pwsdiagghm
blocks.content: Diagonal homomorphism into a structure power. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwsdiagghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cghm, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cpws, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c5, cxp(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c3, co(c0, cghm, c4), co(c0, cmhm, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, co(c0, cmhm, c4)), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  grpmnd(c0)
  pwsdiagmhm(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syldan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cghm, c4), co(c0, cmhm, c4)), wcel(c4, cgrp))
  pwsgrp(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ghmmhmb(c0, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwsdiagghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(c0[^]c1)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c1 × { s0 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c3, (c0[GrpHom]c4), (c0[MndHom]c4), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  sylan(c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈(c0[MndHom]c4), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  grpmnd(c0)
  pwsdiagmhm(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syldan(c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ c2, (c0[GrpHom]c4)=(c0[MndHom]c4), c4 ∈ Grp)
  pwsgrp(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  ghmmhmb(c0, c4)
}

thm ghmf1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)→((c0 : c3 ↣ c4)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c3,((c0 ` s0)= c5 → s0 = c6))))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c1)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2), (c0 : c3 ↣ c4), ∀(s0 ∈ c3,((c0 ` s0)= c5 → s0 = c6)))

thm conjghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c0)∧(c3 : c2 ↔ c2)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(-g ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦((c1[c4]s0)[c5]c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  jca((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c0), (c3 : c2 ↔ c2))

blocks.content: A conjugated subgroup is also a subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(crn(c4), cfv(csubg, c1)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(crn(c4), cfv(csubg, c1), cima(cmpt(s0, c3, co(co(c2, c5, cv(s0)), c6, c2)), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c0, c3))
  subgss(c0, c1, c3)
  syl5eq(cima(cmpt(s0, c3, co(co(c2, c5, cv(s0)), c6, c2)), c0), crn(c4), crn(cres(cmpt(s0, c3, co(co(c2, c5, cv(s0)), c6, c2)), c0)), wss(c0, c3))
  df-ima(cmpt(s0, c3, co(co(c2, c5, cv(s0)), c6, c2)), c0)

  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csg, c1))

  -| wceq(c3, crab(s1, c4, wral(s2, c4, wb(wcel(co(cv(s1), c6, cv(s2)), c0), wcel(co(cv(s2), c6, cv(s1)), c0)))))

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, c4), wceq(c0, crn(c5))))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, c4), wceq(c0, crn(c5)))
  sseldi(c2, c4, c3, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))

thm conjnsg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c0 = ran(c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c5 =(+ ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(-g ` c1)
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦((c2[c5]s0)[c6]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  syl2an2r(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, c0 = ran(c4), c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1), c2 ∈ { hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))})
  nsgsubg(c0, c1)
  biimpar(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ { hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))})
  eleq2d(c2, { hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))}, c3, c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  simprbi(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), { hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))} = c3, c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1))
  isnsg4(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, { hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))}, c3, c5)
  conjnmz(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, { hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))}, c4, c3, c5, c6)
  eqid({ hs0 ∈ c3 | ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))})

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, c3, ∀(hs1 ∈ c3,((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0)))
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs1, c3, ((hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0 ↔(hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0))
  diff.wb.s(s0, (hs0[c5]hs1)∈ c0, (hs1[c5]hs0)∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (hs0[c5]hs1), c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c5, hs1)

blocks.name: qusghm
blocks.content: If ` Y ` is a normal subgroup of ` G ` , then the "natural map" from elements to their cosets is a group homomorphism from ` G ` to ` G / Y ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)

thm qusghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c1, cghm, c3)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  isghmd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)))

  3expb(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(co(cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0))), cec(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  qusadd(c0, c1, cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c1), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  oveq12d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  fvmpt3i(s0, cv(hs0), c4, c2, cec(cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(s0), co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  eceq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), co(c1, cqg, c0))
  ad2antll(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs1)), cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0))))
  fvmpt3i(s0, cv(hs1), c4, c2, cec(cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0)), cec(cv(s0), co(c1, cqg, c0)))
  eceq1(cv(s0), cv(hs1), co(c1, cqg, c0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))), cec(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(c1, cqg, c0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c4))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), c4), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cnsg, c1)), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))

  eceq1(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1)), co(c1, cqg, c0))

thm qusghm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1)→ c2 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c3 =(c1[/s](c1[~QG]c0))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦[s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  isghmd(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3, c4, (Base ` c3), (+ ` c1), (+ ` c3), c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  qusgrp(c0, c1, c3)
  fmptd(s0, c2, c4, (Base ` c3), [s0](c1[~QG]c0), c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1))
  quseccl(c0, c1, s0, c4, (Base ` c3), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  3eqtr4rd((c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)), ((c2 ` hs0)[(+ ` c3)](c2 ` hs1)), ([hs0](c1[~QG]c0)[(+ ` c3)][hs1](c1[~QG]c0)), [(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0), (c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)))
  3expb(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ∈ c4, hs1 ∈ c4, ([hs0](c1[~QG]c0)[(+ ` c3)][hs1](c1[~QG]c0))=[(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0))
  qusadd(c0, c1, hs0, c4, hs1, (+ ` c3), (+ ` c1), c3)
  eqid((+ ` c3))
  oveq12d((c2 ` hs0), (+ ` c3), (c2 ` hs1), [hs0](c1[~QG]c0), [hs1](c1[~QG]c0), (c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)))
  ad2antrl(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ∈ c4, hs1 ∈ c4, (c2 ` hs0)=[hs0](c1[~QG]c0))
  fvmpt3i(s0, hs0, c4, c2, [hs0](c1[~QG]c0), [s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  eceq1(s0, hs0, (c1[~QG]c0))
  ad2antll(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), hs0 ∈ c4, hs1 ∈ c4, (c2 ` hs1)=[hs1](c1[~QG]c0))
  fvmpt3i(s0, hs1, c4, c2, [hs1](c1[~QG]c0), [s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  eceq1(s0, hs1, (c1[~QG]c0))
  syl((c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4)), (c2 `(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))=[(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)∈ c4)
  sylan(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), (hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4), (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)∈ c4, c1 ∈ Grp)
  syl(c0 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c1), c1 ∈ Grp, c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1))
  nsgsubg(c0, c1)
  subgrcl(c0, c1)
  3expb(c1 ∈ Grp, hs0 ∈ c4, hs1 ∈ c4, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)∈ c4)
  grpcl(c1, hs0, c4, hs1, (+ ` c1))
  eqid((+ ` c1))
  fvmpt3i(s0, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), c4, c2, [(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1)](c1[~QG]c0), [s0](c1[~QG]c0))
  eceq1(s0, (hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1), (c1[~QG]c0))
  ax-mp([s0](c1[~QG]c0)∈ 𝕌, (c1[~QG]c0)∈ 𝕌)
  ovex(c1, cqg, c0)
  ecexg((c1[~QG]c0), universe, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

blocks.name: ghmpropd
blocks.content: Group homomorphism depends only on the group attributes of structures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ghmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c3), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c2, cghm, c3), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmhm, c3))))
  anbi12d(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmhm, c3)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1), co(c2, cmhm, c3), w0)
  mhmpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  biadanii(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmhm, c1)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ghmgrp2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c0, cghm, c1), co(c0, cmhm, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cgrp)))
  ghmmhmb(c0, c1)
  biadanii(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmhm, c3)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3)), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp))
  ghmgrp1(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  ghmgrp2(cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), co(c2, cghm, c3), co(c2, cmhm, c3), wa(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c3, cgrp)))
  ghmmhmb(c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cghm, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cghm, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm ghmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[GrpHom]c1)=(c2[GrpHom]c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 =(Base ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 =(Base ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 =(Base ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 =(Base ` c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))→(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c2)]s1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c3)]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0[GrpHom]c1), (c2[GrpHom]c3), w0)
  3bitr4g(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c1), hs0 ∈(c2[GrpHom]c3), ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ Grp)∧ hs0 ∈(c0[MndHom]c1)), ((c2 ∈ Grp ∧ c3 ∈ Grp)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[MndHom]c3)))
  anbi12d(w0, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ Grp), hs0 ∈(c0[MndHom]c1), (c2 ∈ Grp ∧ c3 ∈ Grp), hs0 ∈(c2[MndHom]c3))
  anbi12d(w0, c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ Grp, c2 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ Grp)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  grppropd(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c0[MndHom]c1), (c2[MndHom]c3), w0)
  mhmpropd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  biadanii(hs0 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c1), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ Grp), hs0 ∈(c0[MndHom]c1))
  jca(hs0 ∈(c0[GrpHom]c1), c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ Grp)
  ghmgrp1(hs0, c0, c1)
  ghmgrp2(hs0, c0, c1)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c0[GrpHom]c1), (c0[MndHom]c1), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ Grp))
  ghmmhmb(c0, c1)
  biadanii(hs0 ∈(c2[GrpHom]c3), (c2 ∈ Grp ∧ c3 ∈ Grp), hs0 ∈(c2[MndHom]c3))
  jca(hs0 ∈(c2[GrpHom]c3), c2 ∈ Grp, c3 ∈ Grp)
  ghmgrp1(hs0, c2, c3)
  ghmgrp2(hs0, c2, c3)
  eleq2d(hs0, (c2[GrpHom]c3), (c2[MndHom]c3), (c2 ∈ Grp ∧ c3 ∈ Grp))
  ghmmhmb(c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[GrpHom]c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[GrpHom]c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
